RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 14. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AULD LANGE SYNE made the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, the rider lost his whip at the three sixteenths pole, dug in to hold off the runner up through the final furlong under a strong hand ride while two wide and proved best in a game effort. ALGORIX pressured the winner two wide into the far turn, dropped inside that one nearing the top of the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead at the furlong marker then couldn't get past the winner. SHELL FIRE went evenly. RAMIRIN trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Ramirin
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led throughout, lost whip 3/16pole, hand ride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. Norman G. Lewis & Laurence Lewis

ENTRY.NAME: Algorix
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, angled inside 1/4 pole, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Shell Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOT MARIE stalked the pace four wide, rallied three wide in the four path through the stretch under left then right handed urging and was along in time. SICILIAN STYLE TWO away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch and finished second best two wide. WORTHINESS never far back, offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. SISTER CODE chased the early pace three wide and faltered late. INSIDE GIRL was unruly in the gate, broke awkwardly and was outrun. ICY RAIN was no factor. DANCING FOR MONEY pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Worthiness
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, inside bid, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing for Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Inside Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: unruly gate, awkward start, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Sicilian Style Two
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, second best, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Dot Marie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4 wide, rallied 3 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7, 500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BANNED FROM MIDWAY set the pace along the inside through the first turn, gave up the advantage, angled outside the leader entering the far turn, was carried out to the nine path at the top of the stretch, dug in gamely and proved best in a long drive. RIPLEY EFFECT stalked the pace into the stretch, swung out to the middle of the racetrack, angled inside the leading pair in deep stretch, surged in the four path and got up for second. DREAM TO WIN pressed the pace two wide through the first turn, made the lead, set the pace into the stretch, swung out to the eight path at the top of the lane then was outfinished. UNCAPTURED FAITH broke awkwardly, was allowed to settle then steadily gained ground through the stretch along the inside. ADMONISH was no threat. I MATTER was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncaptured Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, late gain, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: I Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Ripley Effect
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, swung wide, angled in late, gaining 4path,

ENTRY.NAME: Banned From Midway
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, angled out 3/8 pole, carried 9p, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Admonish
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Dream to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2 wide, took over backstretch, swung wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Oh io Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA MUNECA broke in full stride to set all the pace and maintained her advantage under left handed urging. BISCOTTINI trailed into the turn then rallied steadily along the rail through the stretch in a determined effort. OPULENT WAYS never far back, finished with good courage in the seven path. SNACKSTER pressured the winner along the inside into the turn, dropped back and angled out, drifted to the six path entering the stretch then was outfinished. FLYING BUSINESS had good early speed three wide and faded in the stretch. PROUD MAID MARIAN had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Opulent Ways
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Maid Marian
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Snackster
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, angled outturn, drifted 6path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: La Muneca
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, held well, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Biscottini
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late gain rail, good effort,

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 3 wide, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 60. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since April 14 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SALUTE THE KID stalked the pace four wide down the backstretch, rallied three wide into the turn, made the lead at the five sixteenths pole, set the balance of the pace and drew off under left handed urging. KAT TRAX sprinted up the inside to make the lead soon after the start, set the pace until midway on the turn, kept pressure into the stretch and held on for second. SECRETS UNTOLD offered a mild bid two wide into the stretch then leveled off. BEAUTIFUL LASS unhurried early, swung wide and closed some ground late in the middle of the racetrack. CRIMSON LEGION slow early, found her best stride late along the rail. I'M JAC'D failed to menace. TITEBLUEJEANS was no threat. KISS VALENTINA pressed the early pace three then two wide and was through after half. FRIENDLY MERGER had brief speed, stopped and was eased to the wire. VILLAGE CAT pressed the early pace two wide, stopped on the turn and was eased to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Secrets Untold
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Kat Trax
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace inside mid turn, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Village Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, stopped turn, eased to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Friendly Merger
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, stopped, eased to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Legion
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late rail

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late gain, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Jac'd
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Salute the Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4 wide, rallied 3 wide turn, drew off, left handed urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 43. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANES HEART split horses two wide to make the lead after a quarter, drew well clear on the far turn, set the balance of the pace and just lasted under right handed urging. BRONZE KETTLE slow early, closed with a rush through deep stretch under right handed urging and got up in the final stride to finish on even terms with DANES HEART at the wire. VEGAS PLAYER pressed the pace two wide through the first turn, made the lead briefly, chased the pace into the stretch then gave way readily. NOSEY POWER was no factor. STRIKING AGAIN passed tiring rivals. COLOR BEARER close up, was through after a half. WHY KENNY WHY set the pace along the inside through the clubhouse turn, had speed for a half then stopped. IPPOLITO'S WONDER moved up two wide into the far turn and also stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Ippolito's Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Why Kenny Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, stopped far turn

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Danes Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: McFadden Jr Joseph A and Fewster Melody K
ENTRY.COMMENT: split horses 2 wide 7/16p, drew off 2nd turn, all out,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Joseph A. McFadden Jr. & Mr.& Mrs. Melody K. Fe

ENTRY.NAME: Vegas Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led between calls, chased, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Bronze Kettle
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, closed with a rush, right handed urging, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Color Bearer
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Nosey Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 14 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since April 14 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLD N SILVER pressed the pace two wide for five furlongs, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and proved best under mild right handed urging. MY BROTHER CAM never far back, finished with good courage along the inside. SUSIE'S KID stalked the early pace three wide, drew closer nearing the quarter pole then was outfinished. BEAT THE DEALER trailed early and passed tiring rivals five wide. PATIO PARTY away alertly, set the pace along the inside for five furlongs, kept pressure into the stretch and weakened late. GOLDEN TONE close up for a half, stopped on the far turn and was eased to the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 5/8, weakened deep stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, inched closer 2nd turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, finished well, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals, 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Gold N Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, stopped second turn, eased wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 56. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 14 Allowed 2 l bs. A Race Since April 14 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXCITEMENT stalked the pace through the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead past the furlong marker and drew off under right handed urging. FLAG RAISER away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. CASUAL ATTIRE unhurried early, had a mild late rally three wide. CHOCOLATE RABBIT well placed, went evenly. PROSECUTOR pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and weakened late. PRECIOUS JULES was no factor. MARCH MAGIC was through early. ORLEANS STORM reared at the start, was never close, lost contact with his field and was distanced. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND AFTER REVIEW TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Casual Attire
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally late 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Flag Raiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Prosecutor
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened, late

ENTRY.NAME: Precious Jules
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Rabbit
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Excitement
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: March Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Orleans Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared start, never close, distanced, walked off
